description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence (DND), more specifically Canadian Forces Health Services Group (CF H Svcs Gp) has a requirement for the supply of reclining phlebotomy chairs.
full_summary:
======================
**Phlebotomy Chairs**

**Notice Title:** Phlebotomy Chairs

**Reference Number:** cb-9122-19488620

**Publication Date:** September 15, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** October 6, 2023 at 14:00:00

**Solicitation Number:** W6369-23-A071A

**Amendment Number:** 8

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding

**Trade Agreements:** Negotiable under the following agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Petawawa, Ontario

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Petawawa, Ontario

**Items Being Procured:**

Reclining phlebotomy chairs for use in Canadian Forces Health Services Group (CF H Svcs Gp) laboratories. Goods must be delivered to Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED) at 105 Montgomery Road, Canada Forces Base Petawawa, Petawawa, Ontario.

**Contract Period:**

* From contract award to March 31, 2028

**Functionalriterial Requirements:**

* Initial Requirement: delivery of goods within six weeks from contract award
* Optional Requirements: delivery before March 31, 2028, on an "as and requested" basis

**Submission Details:**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* Attachments:
	+ Amendment 004 QA (English and French)
	+ Amendment 003 (English and French)
	+ Amendment 002 QA (English and French)
	+ Amendment 001 QA (English and French)
	+ RFPH-Draft_RFP_QA (English and French)

**Contact Information:**

* Thomas Kardaras
* E-mail: [thomas.kardaras@forcesgc.ca](mailto:thomas.kardaras@forcesgc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 298-3572
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada
